      • div

        public static Point div(Point pt,
                        float divisor)
        Divide a point by a divisor and return the result.
        Parameters:
        pt - the point to divide
        divisor - the divisor
        Returns:
        a new point which is the point divided by the divisor

      • mult

        public static Point mult(Point pt,
                         float multiplier)
        Multiply a point by a multiplier and return the result.
        Parameters:
        pt - the point to multiply
        multiplier - the multiplier
        Returns:
        a new point which is the product of pt and multiplier
